description:
Raishin`s automaton. She`s one of Karyuusai Brand`s greatest automatons, the Moon in their Setsugetsuka Series, and she`s worth enough to buy a warship. She loves Raishin too much, and gets extremely jealous when he`s with other women and often loses control. Using her magic circuit, Kongouriki, she converts the monad in her personal territory into a super-hard material and raises her physical strength several thousand times, granting her both huge offensive and defensive power. Her favorite food is anmitsu.
Source: ANN
name: Yaya
